short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RSSkit is a refined RSS reader with useful features for the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
with RSSkit reader, you can use the useful features including:
- AI summary (requires your own api key, support OpenAI and Azure OpenAI)
- Reader view
- Filter
- Search post
- more are coming!
